definition: to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
rules of calculation (addition, subtraction, multiplication and division)/algorithm/fig. to scheme/to calculate (i.e. plot)

sentences.english: How to defense collusive attack is the key problems for the designing of fingerprinting.

sentences.chinese: 回答此问题，并编写算法求解思考题。

sentences.english: Based on randomizing techniques, this paper discussed how the sketch-based approach estimates approximate answers to aggregate queries.

sentences.english: An ergodic recursive Algorithm is suggested for the analyse of the reliability of distribution grid.

sentences.english: Experiment results show that those approaches have good real -time performance and vivid effect.

sentences.english: Experimental results show that this algorithm improves the speed of frequent itemsets mining.

sentences.english: In this paper studed the algorithm to realize the disjoint calculation in multistate system.
sentences.chinese: 该文研究多状态系统不交化运算的实现算法。

sentences.english: The performance of the adaptive algorithm can directly affect the effect of the echo canceller.

sentences.english: Dead-zone operator is adopted in the adaptive algorithm, which improves the robustness of the algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 自适应算法中采用了死区算子，增强了算法的鲁棒性。

sentences.english: Then the thesis analyzed the significance of applying unscented kalman filter to inverted pendulum system.
sentences.chinese: 分析无迹卡尔曼滤波算法在倒立摆系统上应用的意义。

sentences.english: A hardware-in-the-loop test bench was developed and was applied in debugging the algorithms that had been mentioned previously.
